verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy Bible book divine Precious treasure thou art mine Mine to tell me whence I came Mine to teach me what I am{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mine to chide me when I rove Mine to show a Savior's love Mine thou art to guide and guard Mine to punish or reward{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mine to comfort in distress Suffering in this wilderness Mine to show by living faith Man can triumph over death{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mine to tell of joys to come And the rebel sinner's doom O thou holy book divine Precious treasure Thou art mine{/lang-eng}
